markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 43 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 41 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38 [Ravager Of Tindalos](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1717) **Source** [Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star](/Sources.aspx?ID=103) pg. 39 **Perception** +31; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +35, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +32, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +35, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +35, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +31 **Str** +6 **Dex** +9 **Con** +6 **Int** +6 **Wis** +7 **Cha** +5 --- **AC** 43 **Fort** +30 **Ref** +33 **Will** +31 **HP** 250 **Immunities** [controlled](/Traits.aspx?ID=241), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) **Resistances** [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) 20, [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) 20, physical 20 **Otherworldly Mind** ([mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) Whenever a creature targets the ravager of Tindalos with a [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effect, that creature takes 9d6 mental damage (DC 40 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save). On a critical failure, it also becomes [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) for 1 minute.
**Ripping Gaze** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) 60 feet. The hound of Tindalos's eyes glow balefully, causing painful but bloodless wounds to rip open in the body of a creature that meets its awful gaze. When a creature ends its turn in the aura's emanation, it takes 9d6 slashing damage (DC 37 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save). A creature that critically succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 24 hours.
**Vulnerable to Curved Space** When a hound of Tindalos is not adjacent to a structural angle of 90ยบ (or more acute), its resistance to physical damage is suppressed and it becomes [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34). It can't recover from this sickened condition, but the condition ends automatically once the hound is again adjacent to a suitable angle. --- **Speed** 30 feet, fly 30 feet **Melee** jaws +34, **Damage** 3d10+14 piercing plus 2d6 mental **Melee** claw +34 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 3d8+14 slashing plus 2d6 mental **Occult Innate Spells** DC 40, attack +32 - **6th** [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289) - **7th** [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147) - **8th** [Discern Location](/Spells.aspx?ID=75), [Dimensional Anchor](/Spells.aspx?ID=70), [Disappearance](/Spells.aspx?ID=73) (self only) - **Constant (9th)** [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Angled Entry** The hound of Tindalos casts a 4th-level [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) spell, but it must transport itself into a space adjacent to an angle of 90ยบ (or more acute) in the structure or environment around it. For example, it could teleport to a space adjacent to a wall (using the angle between the wall and floor) or a corner in a room, or adjacent to a sizable tree growing straight up out of the ground, but not to a flat plain or a room with only curved corners and edges.
Once per day, the hound can use this ability to plane shift to or from the [Dimension of Time](/Planes.aspx?ID=21), with the same restrictions on what angles it can appear next to. **Ferocious Bites** The ravager of Tindalos makes three Strikes with its jaws attack. Each Strike must be against a different opponent within its reach. Each attack counts toward the ravager's multiple attack penalty, but does not increase its penalty until it has made all the attacks.
name: Ravager Of Tindalos

On a critical failure, it also becomes confused for 1 minute. Ripping Gaze (aura, evocation, occult, visual) 60 feet. The hound of Tindalos's eyes glow balefully, causing painful but bloodless wounds to rip open in the body of a creature that meets its awful gaze. When a creature ends its turn in the aura's emanation, it takes 9d6 slashing damage (DC 37 basic Fortitude save). A creature that critically succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 24 hours. Vulnerable to Curved Space When a hound of Tindalos is not adjacent to a structural angle of 90ยบ (or more acute), its resistance to physical damage is suppressed and it becomes sickened 1. It can't recover from this sickened condition, but the condition ends automatically once the hound is again adjacent to a suitable angle. --- Speed 30 feet, fly 30 feet Melee Single Action jaws +34, Damage 3d10+14 piercing plus 2d6 mental Melee Single Action claw +34 (Agile), Damage 3d8+14 slashing plus 2d6 mental Occult Innate Spells DC 40, attack +32 - 6th Slow - 7th Haste - 8th Discern Location, Dimensional Anchor, Disappearance (self only) - Constant (9th) True Seeing Angled Entry Single Action The hound of Tindalos casts a 4th-level dimension door spell, but it must transport itself into a space adjacent to an angle of 90ยบ (or more acute) in the structure or environment around it. For example, it could teleport to a space adjacent to a wall (using the angle between the wall and floor) or a corner in a room, or adjacent to a sizable tree growing straight up out of the ground, but not to a flat plain or a room with only curved corners and edges. Once per day, the hound can use this ability to plane shift to or from the Dimension of Time, with the same restrictions on what angles it can appear next to. Ferocious Bites Two Actions The ravager of Tindalos makes three Strikes with its jaws attack. Each Strike must be against a different opponent within its reach. Each attack counts toward the ravager's multiple attack penalty, but does not increase its penalty until it has made all the attacks.
